question: The resolution of the Non-cooperation movement was adopted in which session of the Indian National Congress?
explanation: In the special session of Calcutta in the year 1920, the Indian National Congress adopted the resolution of the Non-cooperation movement. Lala Lajpat Rai was the president of the session. And the resolution was passed in the Nagpur session in the same year. C Vijayaraghavachariar was the president of the session.
